Weapon.Name: Flameheart Sword
Weapon.Description: This sword was forged in the heart of a volcano, its blade always glowing with a fierce inner fire.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the sword swings, flames envelop the battlefield, igniting the enemy.

Weapon.Name: Thunderstrike Lance
Weapon.Description: A lance charged with the storm's might, crackling with electricity at its tip.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The lance releases a bolt of lightning, stunning all foes in its path.

Weapon.Name: Mystic Staff
Weapon.Description: A staff imbued with ancient magics, glowing with an ethereal light.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: A chilling wave emanates from the staff, freezing everything in sight.
